## avc list

List files of a commit

```
avc list [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # List files for the latest version
  avc list

  # List files for the specific version
  avc list v1.0.0
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for list
```

### SEE ALSO

* [avc](/commands/avc/)	 - ArtiVC is a version control system for large files
